    • Method Detail

      • addNewUser

        public void addNewUser(User newuser)
        Adds a new user to the database
        Parameters:
        newuser - the user to be added

      • validateUser

        public boolean validateUser(Credentials creds)
        Accepts a user object and queries the database to determine whether or not the user is found
        Parameters:
        creds - the user's credentials to be validated
        Returns:
        returns true if the user is found in the database else false

      • getUserInfo

        public UserInfo getUserInfo(Credentials creds)
        Returns the user's name and email based on credentials
        Parameters:
        creds - the user's credentials
        Returns:
        a Credentials object associated with that user. If no user is found, returns null

      • getUser

        public User getUser(Credentials creds)
        Returns all information pertaining to a user
        Parameters:
        creds - the user's credentials
        Returns:
        returns a User object if found, else null

      • updateUser

        public void updateUser(User user)
        Replaces an existing user with an updated version Finds a user with the same credentials, removes that user from the table, then adds the updated version
        Parameters:
        user - the updated version to replace the existing user
